comments:
Description:
  When run attached designe file using engine report runner the following error accurs:
Sep 6, 2006 3:02:00 PM org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.RunAndRenderTask run
SEVERE: Error happened while running the report.

Steps to reproduce:
 use Engine report runner to run attached designe file.

Expected result:
 generate a report file.

Actual result:
 error occurs and no report file generated.

Notes:
  The error occurs on Win2k,Redhat Linux AS3.0 and Suse Linux 9.0. no error when run on Windows Server 2003 and WinXP.
